dist

Class FixedDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.AbstractDistribution
      • dist.FixedDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Distribution, java.io.Serializable, Copyable

    public class FixedDistribution
extends AbstractDistribution
implements Copyable
    A distribution that does not reestimate
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
